topic.title: Tuberculosis Possible Exposure Location Act - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:746)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:747)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="413350009" Finding with explicit context (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:753)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:750)
SHALL contain participant (CONF:758, CONF:767, CONF:860, CONF:759, CONF:768, CONF:761, CONF:762, CONF:763, CONF:769, CONF:764)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:746)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:747)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="413350009" Finding with explicit context (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:753)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:750)
SHALL contain participant (CONF:758, CONF:767, CONF:860, CONF:759, CONF:768, CONF:761, CONF:762, CONF:763, CONF:769, CONF:764)
